      • toScreen

        public java.awt.Point toScreen(WorldLocation val)
        Description copied from interface: CanvasType
        Convert the location provided to screen coordinates GOTCHA there's am optimisation in the default projection where we don't produce a new Point each time, we return a local working copy. So, if you're working in code which requires two Points (drawing a line, for example) in the creation of one of your points you must use a copy constructor
        Specified by:
        toScreen in interface CanvasType
